content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hi Haoyu Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you have a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. That sounds perfect for my needs. I am a student, so I am looking for the lowest price possible. How about 300 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for my liking.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you might think 300 Euro is too low. How about we meet in the middle at 400 Euro? It's a fair price for a great apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still not high enough for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. How about we set the price at 450 Euro per month? This is a great price for an apartment of this quality in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price could still be higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I understand. Let's set the price at 500 Euro per month. This is a fair price for an apartment of this quality in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [500] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, I'm glad we could agree on a price. I hope you enjoy your stay in the city center apartment. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
